elements.title: Future Energy Associates
elements.description: Future Energy Associates are a team of data scientists and energy specialists with experience across the UK and European energy systems. Lawrence, one of the directors, also works for Subak, he's on CAT

elements.title: Climate Policy Radar
elements.description: Climate Policy Radar CIC is  a not-for profit, data-led, climate startup. We are on a mission to map and analyse the climate policy landscape globally to support evidence-based decision making and investment to drive the transition to a low carbon, resilient world. Received funding from [quadrature climate foundation](https://quadrature.ai/foundation/)

elements.title: Clean Horizon
elements.description: French Clean Horizon is a consultancy specifically dedicated to energy storage

elements.title: Dhybrid
elements.description: Microgrid developers, Dhybrid main goal is to maximize the effectiveness of energy conversion. In [June 21](https://www.energy-storage.news/news/dhybrid-installs-microgrids-on-26-maldivian-islands-to-reduce-diesel-relian) they installed microgrids on 26 Maldivian islands to reduce diesel reliance

elements.title: Cenex
elements.description: Cenex was established as the UK’s first Centre of Excellence for Low Carbon and Fuel Cell technologies in 2005. Cenex focuses on low emission transport & associated energy infrastructure and operates as an independent, not-for-profit research technology organisation (RTO)

elements.title: DNV
elements.description: Giant group DNV are the independent expert in assurance and risk management, headquartered in Oslo with operations in more than 100 countries. They have a [part of the business](https://www.dnv.com/power-renewables/services/testing/battery-storage.html) dedicated to storage. In [December 2020](https://www.dnv.com/news/dnv-gl-performs-technical-due-diligence-for-gore-street-energy-storage-fund-s-acquisition-of-anesco-s-81-mw-uk-operational-battery-storage-portfolio-192425), selected by Gore Street Capital to undertake a range of technical due diligence services on an 81 MW operational battery storage portfolio.

elements.title: Volans
elements.description: From inception, Volans has strived to span the yawning divide between current approaches to sustainability and what’s needed to create a truly sustainable future for all.

elements.title: Anthesis
elements.description: Since establishing in 2013, Anthesis Group has grown to more than 600 sustainability experts, through organic growth and strategic acquisitions.

elements.title: New Resource Partners
elements.description: UK based New Resource partners provide strategy advice and techno-economic due diligence on renewable, flexible and smart energy technologies. Found through a KTN call.

elements.title: Green Yellow
elements.description: Paris based. Utilizing the rooftops of stores and warehouses to produce photovoltaic solar power at a large scale

elements.title: SRS Works
elements.description: solutions for energy reduction strategies

elements.title: Roadnight Taylor
elements.description: Helping UK businesses and organisations make the best and safest energy choices that deliver against their specific objectives –  whether that’s reducing bills, generating income, shrinking carbon footprint or increasing resilience and competitiveness.

elements.title: GreenEnco
elements.description: We are providing engineering & technical services and asset performance management to the solar PV stakeholders, from concept planning through to completion.

elements.title: Carbon Intelligence
elements.description: London based Carbon Intelligence brings together a team of strategists, technologists, data scientists and engineers. Our sustainability experts believe in business as the solution to a zero-carbon economy, not the problem.

elements.title: Icebreaker One
elements.description: Icebreaker's mission is to Unlock standards-based marketplaces for environmental & financial data and leveraged finance for innovation. Reduce the cost and friction associated with moving data across organisations and markets. Won [phase 2 of SBRI MEDA](https://icebreakerone.org/energy/) competion

elements.title: Avieco - formerly Carbon Smart
elements.description: Avieco / Carbon Smart help businesses take the sustainability steps that make sense to them

elements.title: Delta EE
elements.description: Delta-EE provides research to the new energy industry through research services and bespoke consultancy projects, depending on the individual client's needs.

elements.title: Ongen
elements.description: helping organisations and small businesses save money on energy costs, reduce carbon footprint and secure energy supply.

elements.title: Regen
elements.description: Regen offers independent expert advice and market insight on all aspects of sustainable energy delivery. We use our technical expertise, industry research and policy knowledge to support a range of public and private sector organisations to make the most of their clean energy opportunities.

elements.title: EVO Energy
elements.description: We turn blue chip companies and SMEs’ sites into ecosystems of sustainable energy through rooftop solar panels, battery storage, solar carports and EV charging stations. check their [PPA](ttps://www.evoenergy.co.uk/services/power-purchase-agreement/) (min 200 panels / 40kwp, recommend epc certificate)

elements.title: Element Energy
elements.description: Element Energy is a team of experts based in Cambridge, London, York and Lille who specialise in the intelligent analysis of low carbon energy.

elements.title: D2H engineering
elements.description: D2H engineering consultancy company in Indianapolis and UK, several projects in energy including a battery model

elements.title: Inspired Energy
elements.description: Inspired Energy Manchester based, big company providing all sorts of professional services for energy distributors, businesses etc.

elements.title: Pexapark
elements.description: Pexapark is a Zurich based consultancy specialised in PPA deals
